Accessibility Palette Pro

- Single HTML file with inline CSS and JS (no external libraries or dependencies)
- **Core feature**: Drag-and-drop color palette builder for accessibility testing with live WCAG contrast ratios (AA/AAA levels)
- **Grid layout**: Responsive 4-column CSS grid for palette tiles (mobile: 1-col, tablet: 2-col, desktop: 4-col); each tile shows hex code, preview swatch, role label (text/fill/border)
- **Accessibility helpers**:
  - ARIA labels on all interactive elements
  - Keyboard navigation: Tab to focus tiles, Enter/Space to edit color, Arrow keys to reorder palette, Escape to cancel
  - High-contrast mode toggle (stored in localStorage)
  - Screen reader announcements for color changes and contrast results
- **Offline-first persistence**: Save/load palettes via localStorage (key: "accessibilityPalettes"); auto-save every 30s and on blur
- **Share via URL hash**: Encode current palette as compact Base64 hash (e.g., #palette=FF5733,28A745,6F42C1); auto-load from hash on page init
- **Live contrast checker**: Select two colors (via dropdown or click), compute WCAG contrast ratio with pass/fail badges (AA/AAA); display ratio as large accessible number
- **Color tools**:
  - Color picker input (native <input type="color">)
  - Random accessible color generator button (generates WCAG-compliant pairs)
  - Copy hex to clipboard button per tile (with ARIA live feedback)
- **UI structure**:
  - Header: App title, high-contrast toggle, export/share buttons
  - Main grid: 8 draggable palette tiles (add/delete via + button)
  - Sidebar: Contrast tester, palette name input, clear/save buttons
  - Footer: Keyboard shortcuts help (modal toggle)
- **Data model**: Array of palettes [{name: string, colors: [{hex: string, role: 'text'|'fill'|'border'}]}]; default empty palette on first load
- **Edge cases**: Handle localStorage quota exceeded (alert + fallback to sessionStorage), validate hex codes, graceful hash decode failure
- **Performance**: Under 800 lines total; no frameworks; vanilla JS only
- **Test checklist**:
  - Drag tile to reorder (mouse + touch)
  - Tab through all controls + Enter to edit
  - Toggle contrast mode persists after refresh
  - Share URL loads identical palette
  - Contrast shows "Pass AA" for #000/#FFF pair
  - Works offline after first load
